history.proof: intros T f g v H1 H2 H3. apply existSys; auto.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (T : System) (f g : Formula) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys LNT v T -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula LNT g) -> SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNT) T f) g -> SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNT) T (existH v f)) g

Premises:
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
SysPrf = folProof.SysPrf LNT : fol.System LNT -> fol.Formula LNT -> Prop
Module fol := Struct Record Language : Type := language { Relations : Set; Functions : Set; arity : Relations + Functions -> nat } Definition Relations : Language -> Set. Definition Functions : Language -> Set. Definition arity : forall l : Language, Relations l + Functions l -> nat. Inductive Term (L : Language) : Set := var : nat -> Term L | apply : forall f : Functions L, Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> Term L with Terms (L : Language) : nat -> Set := Tnil : Terms L 0 | Tcons : forall n : nat, Term L -> Terms L n -> Terms L (S n) Definition Term_rect : forall (L : Language) (P : Term L -> Type), (forall n : nat, P (var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inr f
existH = fol.existH LNT : nat -> fol.Formula LNT -> fol.Formula LNT Arguments existH _%nat_scope
System = fol.System LNT : Type
Add : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> list A -> Prop
Formula = fol.Formula LNT : Set
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Module Ensembles := Struct Definition Ensemble : Type -> Type. Definition In : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> U -> Prop. Definition Included : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> Ensemble U -> Prop. Inductive Empty_set (U : Type) : Ensemble U := Definition Empty_set_rect : forall (U : Type) (P : U -> Type) (u : U), Empty_set U u -> P u. Definition Empty_set_ind : forall (U : Type) (P : U -> Prop) (u : U), Empty_set U u -> P u. Definition Empty_set_rec : forall (U : Type) (P : U -> Set) (u : U), Empty_set U u -> P u. Definition Empty_set_sind : forall (U : Type) (P : U -> SProp) (u : U), Empty_set U u -> P u. Inductive Full_set (U :
LNT = {| Relations := Datatypes.Empty_set; Functions := LNTFunction; arity := LNTArity |} : Language
In_freeVarSys : forall L : Language, nat -> fol.System L -> Prop
freeVarFormula : forall L : Language, fol.Formula L -> list nat
existE : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys LNT v T -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula LNT g) -> SysPrf T (existH v f) -> SysPrf T (impH f g) -> SysPrf T g
orSys : forall (T : System) (f g h : Formula), SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNT) T f) h -> SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNT) T g) h -> SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNT) T (orH f g)) h
impI : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNT) T g) f -> SysPrf T (impH g f)
existSys : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula L g) -> folProof.SysPrf L (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) T f) g -> folProof.SysPrf L (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) T (fol.existH L v f)) g
sysWeaken : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNT) T g) f
forallI : forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys LNT v T -> SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T (forallH v f)
existI : forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat) (t : Term), SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNT f v t) -> SysPrf T (existH v f)
existSimp : forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T (existH v f)
folLogic.existE : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula L g) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.existH L v f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L f g) -> folProof.SysPrf L T g
sysExtend : forall (T U : System) (f : Formula), Included (fol.Formula LNT) T U -> SysPrf T f -> SysPrf U f
forallE : forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat) (t : Term), SysPrf T (forallH v f) -> SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNT f v t)
Axm : forall (T : System) (f : Formula), mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T f
folLogic.orSys : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g h : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) T f) h -> folProof.SysPrf L (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) T g) h -> folProof.SysPrf L (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) T (fol.orH L f g)) h
subProp.subFormulaNTEHelp : forall (L : Language) (f g : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), folProof.SysPrf L (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) (Empty_set (fol.Formula L)) f) g -> folProof.SysPrf L (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) (Empty_set (fol.Formula L)) (substituteFormula L f v s)) (substituteFormula L g v s)
forallSimp : forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat), SysPrf T (forallH v f) -> SysPrf T f
iffI : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (impH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH g f) -> SysPrf T (iffH f g)
Deduction.DeductionTheorem : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) T g) f -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L g f)
folLogic.impI : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) T g) f -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L g f)
impE : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (impH g f) -> SysPrf T g -> SysPrf T f
andI : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T g -> SysPrf T (andH f g)
iffE2 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (iffH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH g f)
contradiction : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T (notH f) -> SysPrf T g
orI2 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T g -> SysPrf T (orH f g)
andE2 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (andH f g) -> SysPrf T g
orE : forall (T : System) (f g h : Formula), SysPrf T (orH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH f h) -> SysPrf T (impH g h) -> SysPrf T h
folLogic.sysWeaken : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L T f -> folProof.SysPrf L (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) T g) f
orI1 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T (orH f g)
andE1 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (andH f g) -> SysPrf T f
iffE1 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (iffH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH f g)
cp1 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (impH (notH f) (notH g)) -> SysPrf T (impH g f)
cp2 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (impH g f) -> SysPrf T (impH (notH f) (notH g))
folReplace.reduceSub : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (f g : fol.Formula L), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L f g) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (substituteFormula L f v s) (substituteFormula L g v s))
folLogic.forallI : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> folProof.SysPrf L T f -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.forallH L v f)
nnE : forall (T : System) (f : Formula), SysPrf T (notH (notH f)) -> SysPrf T f
nnI : forall (T : System) (f : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T (notH (notH f))
subProp.freeVarSubFormula4 : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarFormula L (substituteFormula L f v s)) -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula L f) -> In x (freeVarFormula L f)
folLogic.iffI : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L f g) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L g f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L f g)
subProp.subFormulaNil : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (T : fol.System L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), ~ In v (freeVarFormula L f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (substituteFormula L f v s) f)
folLogic.impE : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L g f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T g -> folProof.SysPrf L T f
folReplace.reduceExist : forall (L : Language) (f1 f2 : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (T : fol.System L), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L f1 f2) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (fol.existH L v f1) (fol.existH L v f2))

```coq
intros T f g v H1 H2 H3.
apply existSys; assumption.
Qed.```
